class Model[source]

Model(tokenizer, model) :: ABC

Helper class that provides a standard way to create an ABC using inheritance.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

class TransformerModel[source]

TransformerModel(tokenizer, model) :: Model

Helper class that provides a standard way to create an ABC using inheritance.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

class RNNModel[source]

RNNModel(rnn_type, n_layers, vocab_size, embedding_dim, rnn_units, batch_size, out_path, tokenizer) :: Model

Helper class that provides a standard way to create an ABC using inheritance.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
PARAM_COUNT = 124_772

rnn_type = "gru"
n_layers = 1
vocab_size = tokenizer.get_vocab_size()
embedding_dim = 128
rnn_units = 128
batch_size = 1
out_path = "/tmp"
gru = RNNModel(
    rnn_type,
    n_layers,
    vocab_size,
    embedding_dim,
    rnn_units,
    batch_size,
    out_path,
    tokenizer,
)

assert PARAM_COUNT == gru.model.count_params()
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
EPOCHS = 1
chkpt_path = Path(out_path) / (
    f"{rnn_type}_vocab{vocab_size}_embed{embedding_dim}_units{rnn_units}"
)
history = gru.train(dataset, EPOCHS)

assert chkpt_path.exists()
assert EPOCHS == len(list(chkpt_path.glob("*.index")))
assert EPOCHS == len(history.history["loss"])

2/2 [==============================] - 0s 10ms/step - loss: 4.5998

{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
gru.save()

assert (gru.out_path / "assets").exists()
assert (gru.out_path / "model_config.json").exists()
assert (gru.out_path / "saved_model.pb").exists()
assert (gru.out_path / "tokenizer.json").exists()
assert (gru.out_path / "variables").exists()

INFO:tensorflow:Assets written to: /tmp/gru_vocab100_embed128_units128/assets
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
loaded_gru = RNNModel.from_path(str(gru.out_path))

assert gru.tokenizer.get_vocab() == loaded_gru.tokenizer.get_vocab()
assert gru.model.count_params() == loaded_gru.model.count_params()
assert gru.model.evaluate(dataset, verbose=2) == loaded_gru.model.evaluate(dataset, verbose=2)
